mapper.sql: num, user_num, gym_num, reservation_date, reservation_start_time, reservation_end_time, person_cnt, insert_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into reservation(
) values ( #{num}, #{userNum}, #{gymNum}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationStartTime}, SEC_TO_TIME(TIME_TO_SEC(#{reservationStartTime}) + 3600), #{personCnt}, now(), null )
mapper.select: select reservation.reservation_start_time from gym inner join reservation on gym.num = reservation.gym_num;
